TypeSignature.Value: public class Button : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl, System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl
Public Class Button Inherits WebControl Implements IButtonControl, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class Button : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler, System::Web::UI::WebControls::IButtonControl
type Button = class inherit WebControl interface IButtonControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: Displays a push button control on the Web page.

span.span: Displays a push button control on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [按钮的回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events](#ButtonPostbackBehaviorandServerEvents) - [客户端脚本中处理按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script](#HandlingButtonEventsinClientScript) - [按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls](#ButtonsInDataControls) - [数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls](#BindingDataToTheControls) - [使用 UpdatePanel 控件的按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls](#UsingButtonsWithUpdatePanelControls) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件允许用户以发布到服务器的页面的网页上创建推送按钮。Use the control to create a push button on the Web page that lets users to post a page to the server. 该控件将触发可处理以响应回发的服务器代码中的事件。The control triggers an event in server code that you can handle to respond to the postback. 它还可能会引发之前发布页面或可运行和后取消提交的页面可以处理的客户端脚本中的事件。It can also raise an event in client script that you can handle before the page is posted or that can run and then cancel submission of the page. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 包括多种类型的按钮控件，其中每个在网页以不同方式显示。ASP.NET includes several kinds of button controls, each of which appears differently on Web pages. 它们是控件，它将呈现为按下按钮;控件，它将呈现为链接; 并且控件，它将呈现为图像; 和控件，它允许您创建具有热点的图形，用户可以单击。They are the control, which renders as a push button; the control, which renders as a link; and the control, which renders as an image; and the control, which lets you create a graphic that has hotspots that users can click. 默认情况下，所有按钮控件都提交时单击该页面。By default, all button controls submit the page when clicked. 此外可以使用和控件在页上创建按钮才在服务器代码中可编程的。You can also use the and controls to create buttons on the page that are programmable in server code. HTML 和 Web 服务器控件之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 服务器控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84)。For details about the differences between HTML and Web server controls, see [ASP.NET Web Server Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0d4854a3-6e79-4b7b-a27f-ac57cd9c2a84). 默认情况下，控件是一个提交按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. 一个提交按钮没有命令名称 (由指定属性) 的按钮和只是将网页回发到服务器关联。A Submit button does not have a command name (specified by the property) associated with the button and simply posts the Web page back to the server. 你可以提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式控制的操作执行时单击提交按钮。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 命令按钮有与该按钮，如关联的命令名称`Sort`，通过设置属性。A Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`, by setting the property. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 此外可以使用命令按钮，以提供其他信息的命令执行，如具有属性`Ascending`。You can also use the property with a command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as `Ascending`. 你可以提供的事件处理程序单击命令按钮时执行的事件以编程方式控制的操作。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Command button is clicked. ## 按钮的回发行为和服务器事件Button Postback Behavior and Server Events 当用户单击任何 Web 服务器控件按钮时，则将页发送到服务器。When a user clicks any Web server control button, the page is sent to the server. 这使得 Web 页以进行处理，在基于服务器的代码中引发任何挂起的事件。This causes the Web page to be processed and any pending events to be raised in server-based code. 在所有页面和控件处理已都完成，页面本身到浏览器将重新呈现。When all page and control processing has finished, the page renders itself to the browser again. 该按钮可以引发其自己事件或事件，您可以通过使用基于服务器的代码处理。The buttons can raise their own events or event, which you can handle by using server-based code. 这是不同于传统的 HTML 页中或在基于客户端的 Web 应用程序中，事件在按钮的`onclick`可通过在客户端中运行的 JavaScript 处理事件。This is different than events in traditional HTML pages or in client-based Web applications, where a button's `onclick` event is handled by using JavaScript that runs in the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3). 当用户单击按钮控件时，页面回发到服务器。When users click a button control, the page is posted back to the server. 默认情况下，页面回发到自身，By default, the page is posted back to itself, 你可以配置要发布到另一页的当前页的按钮。You can configure buttons to post the current page to another page. 这可用于创建多页窗体。This can be useful for creating multi-page forms. 有关详细信息，请参阅[跨页面发送在 ASP.NET Web 窗体](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For details, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). ## 客户端脚本中处理按钮事件Handling Button Events in Client Script 按钮控件可以引发服务器事件和客户端事件。Button controls can raise both server events and client events. 服务器事件发生回发后，以及为页面编写服务器端代码中处理。Server events occur after postback, and they are handled in the server-side code that you write for the page. 客户端事件处理在客户端脚本中，通常 ECMAScript (JavaScript)，并提交页之前引发。Client events are handled in client script, typically ECMAScript (JavaScript), and are raised before the page is submitted. 通过将客户端事件添加到 ASP.NET 按钮控件，可以执行任务，例如在提交页上之前, 显示确认对话框，并可能会取消提交。By adding client-side events to ASP.NET button controls, you can perform tasks such as displaying confirmation dialog boxes before submitting the page, and potentially cancel the submission. 有关详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本在 ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)和[如何：响应客户端脚本中的按钮 Web 服务器控件事件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b)。For details, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa) and [How to: Respond to Button Web Server Control Events in Client Script](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab97f0b-1c38-4897-85b0-ac915f6a182b). 您可能还想控件还使用客户端脚本来执行回发 （而不是只需执行 HTTP POST 操作）。You might also want the control to also use client script to perform the postback (instead of simply performing an HTTP POST operation). 这很有用，如果你想要以编程方式操作回发，例如将其附加到页面上其他元素。This can be useful if you want to programmatically manipulate the postback, such as attaching it to other elements on the page. 可以设置控件的属性设置为`true`导致要使用客户端脚本控件基于回发。You can set the control's property to `true` to cause the control to use client-script based postback. ## 按钮控件和验证Button Controls and Validation 如果页面包含 ASP.NET 验证程序控件，默认情况下，单击一个按钮控件导致执行其检查验证程序控件。If a page contains ASP.NET validator controls, by default, clicking a button control causes the validator control to perform its check. 如果验证程序控件的启用了客户端验证，如果通过验证检查失败，则不提交页面。If client-side validation is enabled for a validator control, the page is not submitted if a validation check has failed. 下表介绍了使您能够更精确地控制验证过程的按钮控件支持的属性。The following table describes the properties supported by button controls that enable you to control the validation process more precisely. |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定是否单击的按钮也执行验证检查。Specifies whether clicking the button also performs a validation check. 将此属性设置为`false`以防止验证检查。Set this property to `false` to prevent a validation check.| ||可以指定在单击该按钮时调用的页上的验证程序。Enables you to specify which validators on the page are called when the button is clicked. 如果不建立了任何验证组，单击按钮会调用所有页面上的验证程序。If no validation groups are established, a button click calls all of the validators that are on the page.| 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 数据控件中的按钮Buttons in Data Controls 按钮 Web 服务器控件通常用于在数据控件中，例如中， ，和列表控件。Button Web server controls are often used in data controls, such as in the , , and list controls. 在这些情况下，您通常不响应直接到按钮单击事件。In those cases, you typically do not respond directly to the button click event. 相反，数据控件中的按钮将引发一个事件，是特定于数据控件。Instead, a button in a data control raises an event that is specific to the data control. 例如，在控件中，一个按钮可能引发控件的而不是引发的事件控件的事件。For example, in the control, a button might raise the control's event instead of raising the control's event. 由于数据绑定列表控件可以包含许多按钮，可以设置按钮的属性来指定要作为事件的一部分传递的值。Because data-bound list controls can contain many buttons, you can set the button's property to specify a value to pass as part of the event. 然后可以测试该参数以确定被单击的按钮。You can then test for this argument to see which button was clicked. ## 数据绑定到控件Binding Data to the Controls 可以在为了控制其属性设置将按钮 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据源动态。You can bind the button Web server controls to a data source in order to control their property settings dynamically. 例如，可以设置按钮的通过使用数据绑定的属性。For example, you can set a button's property by using data binding. ## 使用 UpdatePanel 控件的按钮Using Buttons with UpdatePanel Controls 在局部页面呈现使可能刷新不进行回发页面的部分。Partial-page rendering makes it possible to refresh portions of a page without a postback. 控件使你能够将标记参与局部页面呈现的页面部分。 controls enable you to mark parts of the page that participate in partial-page rendering. 默认情况下，所包含的控件的行为控制，包括控制，是执行异步回发而不是回发。By default, the behavior of controls inside an control, including controls, is to perform an asynchronous postback instead of a postback. 这将刷新的内容从回发所源自的控制。This refreshes only the contents of the control from which the postback originates. 除了的方案内的控件控件，可以使用控制与控件在以下方案：In addition to the scenario of a control that is inside an control, you can use controls with controls in the following scenarios: - 定义之外的控件控制作为该面板的控件。Defining a control that is outside an control as an control for that panel. 单击按钮时，它执行异步回发和刷新面板的内容。When the button is clicked, it performs an asynchronous postback and refreshes the contents of the panel. - 定义内的控件控制作为面板。Defining a control that is inside an control as a for the panel. 单击按钮时，它执行回发，即使它位于控件。When the button is clicked, it performs a postback even though it is inside an control. 有关部分页呈现和使用详细信息控件，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)并[部分页呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about partial-page rendering and using controls, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建提交文章 Web 页面回发到服务器内容的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Submit control that posts the Web page content back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Button Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建命令对列表进行排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a Command control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 应设置属性设置为`false`使用时属性回发到不同的页面。You should set the property to `false` when you are using the property to post back to a different page. 在回发至其他页面时，应显式检查验证。You should explicitly check validation when posting back to a different page. 有关示例，请参阅备注部分的属性。For an example, see the Remarks section of the property. 此属性通常设置为`false`有关`reset`或`clear`按钮，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a `reset` or `clear` button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 时的值属性设置为`true`，还可以使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件引发验证。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生页验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意，方法单独激活每个验证的控件。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/CS/buttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonControlCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonControlCausesValidation/VB/buttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 与关联没有命令名称时，通常使用此事件（例如，具有一个提交按钮） 控件。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件，以在 Web 上显示一条消息时页单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a message on the Web page when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler

member this.Command : System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件时常用的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 的控件层次结构中的窗体通过引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件的列表进行排序时单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例中指定的事件处理程序以声明方式，使用属性的控件。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到中的事件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .

span.span: Gets or sets an optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .

value.span: 一个可选参数传递给以及相关的事件。

span.span: An optional parameter passed to the event along with the associated .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定一个参数，用于补充属性。Use the property to specify a parameter that compliments the property. > [!NOTE] > 尽管您可以设置本身的属性，它通常是仅使用时属性也设置。Although you can set the property by itself, it is normally only used when the property is also set. 属性补充通过允许您提供有关要执行的命令的其他信息的属性。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide additional information about the command to perform. 例如，如果您设置属性设置为`Sort`并属性设置为`Ascending`，指定按升序排序的命令。For example, if you set the property to `Sort` and the property to `Ascending`, you specify a command to sort in ascending order. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以创建对按升序排序列表进行排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list in ascending order. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control that is passed to the event.

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control that is passed to the event.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当有多个控件在网页上，使用属性可指定或确定的命令名与每个关联控件。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with each control. 可以设置与任何字符串，标识要执行的命令的属性。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，可以以编程方式确定的命令名称控制并执行相应操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 其他信息，有关该命令，如`Ascending`，可通过使用指定属性。Additional information about the command, such as `Ascending`, may be specified by using the property. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以创建对列表进行排序的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to create a control that sorts a list. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，表示控件的回发的行为。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 对象通常然后传递给方法，用于获取的客户端脚本函数的引用，调用时，会导致服务器回发到页面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 扩展时，使用此方法主要由控件开发人员类。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 您可以重写修改 button 控件的回发选项，或单击该按钮时调用客户端脚本在派生类中的方法。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请务必调用基类的方法，以便回发的标准选项设置。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Button Web Server Controls

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中的客户端脚本

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnClick (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnClick : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: Raises the event of the control.

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 与关联没有命令名称时，通常使用此事件（例如，具有一个提交按钮） 控件。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control (for instance, with a Submit button). 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件，以在网页上显示一个简单的消息。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event in order to display a simple message on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

value.span: 客户端脚本时所执行控件的引发事件。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端侧脚本控件的引发事件。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised. 为此属性呈现在指定的脚本控件的`OnClick`属性除了控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 包含源代码的 Visual Studio Web 站点项目是可随附于本主题：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192871). 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定时，会执行的其他客户端侧脚本单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/cs/button.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.OnClientClick/vb/button.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件时常用的命令名称，如`Sort`，与关联控件。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这使您可以创建多个在 Web 上的控件，并以编程方式确定哪些单击控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 的控件层次结构中的窗体通过引发事件`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件的列表进行排序时单击控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event to sort a list when the control is clicked. 此示例中指定的事件处理程序以声明方式，使用属性的控件。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何指定事件处理程序，并以编程方式将其添加到中的事件`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string PostBackUrl { get; set; }
.property instance string PostBackUrl
Public Overridable Property PostBackUrl As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ PostBackUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PostBackUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: Web 页面的 URL 时从当前页发送单击控件。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将导致页面回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够跨页后使用控件。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. > [!NOTE] > 只有正确指定的路径使用此属性。Only correctly specified paths work with this property. 例如，相对路径 (`Test/default.aspx`)，绝对路径 (`https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx`) 和虚拟 (`~\Test\default.aspx`) 正常工作。For example, relative paths (`Test/default.aspx`), absolute paths (`https://localhost/WebApp/default.aspx`) and virtual (`~\Test\default.aspx`) work correctly. 格式不正确路径如"/ Test/default.aspx"或"\Test\default.aspx"不起作用。Incorrectly formed paths such as "/Test/default.aspx" or "\Test\default.aspx" do not work. 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)有关创建正确的路径的讨论。See [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd) for a discussion on creating correct paths. 设置属性设置为 Web 页的 URL 时要发送到单击控件。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`包含的页将导致控制要发布到`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果未指定的值属性，页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在执行与服务器端验证的控件跨页回发时，应检查的页属性是`true`之前处理回发。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页回发时，要检查的页面是。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the . 下面的 VB 代码演示如何做到这一点：The following VB code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面张贴的技术的详细信息，请参阅[跨页面发送在 ASP.NET Web 窗体](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性执行跨页面发送。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件，页面发到指定的目标页的文本框中输入的值属性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，您还必须在此代码示例所在的同一目录中创建目标页的文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目标页的代码在下一步的示例中提供。The code for target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/button.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/button.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来访问已发布的值从另一个页面使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取前一页从发布并为用户显示的字符串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将会出现错误，因为值`text`字段将为`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，使用此代码创建一个目标页面并将该文件放在与上一示例的代码相同的目录。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须对应于指定的值上一示例中的属性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 运行上一示例的代码时，此页将跨页面发送发生时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/button.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/button.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 跨页发布在 ASP.NET 网页中

span.span: Cross-Page Posting in an ASP.NET Web Page

summary.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在内部使用控件，单击时，引发事件，并定义，如果事件。This event is used internally by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event, and if defined, a event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它将始终显示后一个自定义的文本服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays text following a custom server control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定要在显示的标题控件。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display in the control. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定中显示的标题控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/cs/ButtonClickCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonClickText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonClickText/vb/ButtonClickVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool UseSubmitBehavior { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseSubmitBehavior
Public Overridable Property UseSubmitBehavior As Boolean
public: virtual property bool UseSubmitBehavior { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseSubmitBehavior : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

value.span: 如果该控件使用客户端浏览器的，提交机制;否则为。

span.span: if the control uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否控件使用客户端浏览器的提交机制还是 ASP.NET 回发机制。Use the property to specify whether a control uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 默认情况下此属性的值是`true`，从而导致控件以使用浏览器的提交机制。By default the value of this property is `true`, causing the control to use the browser's submit mechanism. 如果指定`false`，ASP.NET 页面框架将客户端侧脚本添加到要发布到服务器窗体的页面。If you specify `false`, the ASP.NET page framework adds client-side script to the page to post the form to the server. 当属性是`false`，控件开发人员可以使用方法以返回客户端回发事件。When the property is `false`, control developers can use the method to return the client postback event for the . 返回的字符串方法包含客户端的函数调用的文本，并可以插入到客户端事件处理程序。The string returned by the method contains the text of the client-side function call and can be inserted into a client-side event handler. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的提交机制的控件回发到服务器时使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the submit mechanism that a control uses when it posts back to the server. 属性设置为`false`，导致该按钮以使用 ASP.NET 回发机制。The property is set to `false`, causing the button to use the ASP.NET postback mechanism. 如果您查看呈现的网页使用你的浏览器查看源命令的源代码，您将看到客户端脚本已由 ASP.NET 页面框架以窗体发布到服务器。If you view the source code for the rendered page using your browser's View Source command, you will see that client-side script has been added by the ASP.NET page framework to post the form to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/CS/button.usesubmitbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.UseSubmitBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.UseSubmitBehavior/VB/button.usesubmitbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控件组控件回发到服务器时导致验证。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 主题或样式表主题不能设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when a control posts back to the server. 页包含三个用于捕获用户数据的文本框和三个控制措施来确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制在前两个文本框中为`PersonalInfoGroup`验证组并控制第三个文本框处于`LocationInfoGroup`验证组。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 当`Button1`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`PersonalInfoGroup`进行验证。When `Button1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 当`Button2`单击时，仅验证组中的控件`LocationInfoGroup`进行验证。When `Button2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/CS/button.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Button.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Button.ValidationGroup/VB/button.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
